definition: Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Later, I have to go to the Children's Palace to learn the piano.
sentences.chinese: 稍後我必須要去少年宮去學鋼琴。

sentences.english: The two Sunday, the girl went to the children's palace to continue training eyesight.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個週日，丫頭去少年宮繼續訓練視力。

sentences.english: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the Children's Palace ?
sentences.chinese: 稍晚一些我得上少年宮去學鋼琴。

sentences.english: Later I have to go to the Children's Palace to learn the piano.
sentences.chinese: 稍晚一些我得上少年宮去學鋼琴。

sentences.english: Later I have to go to the Children's Palace to learn the guitar.
sentences.chinese: 然後我洗我的衣服，再後來我去少年宮學吉他。

sentences.english: I go to the Children's Palace every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我每週日都會去少年宮。

sentences.english: The afternoon, my brother and I at home, then go to the Children's Palace play.
sentences.chinese: 下午，我和哥哥在家中休息，然後去少年宮遊玩。

sentences.english: This street ends in the Children's Palace.
sentences.chinese: 這條街的盡頭是少年宮。

sentences.english: Every Sunday, I go to the Children's Palace.
sentences.chinese: 每個星期天，我都去少年宮。

sentences.english: I attended the electronics lesson at the Children's Palace.
sentences.chinese: 我在少年宮上電子技術課。

sentences.english: That one day, I must go to the Luohu young people palace school English.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，我要去羅湖青少年宮學英語。

definition: Huicheng district of Huizhou city 惠州市[Hui4 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
(of a cadre etc) to work for a period of time with a grassroots unit to gain firsthand experience/(dialect) taking a crap
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to reserve all the seats (or a large block of seats) at a theater, restaurant etc
Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
